fix-composite.description: Use app namespace instead of android

incident.message: Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 24
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `AuthInterceptor` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Set `android:baselineAligned="false"` on this element for better performance
Replace "..." with ellipsis character (…, …) ?
